name: Contra Corona
description:
Contra Corona is an educational game that teaches you how to prevent yourself against COVID-19 virus. I've worked on it in the beginning of 2020 at Ludo Educativo with a team of up to 5 people. The game has 3 mini-games that aim to raise awareness about the coronavirus, in the first game you learn how to wash your hands, the second is to show the importance of wearing masks and the third is about social distancing. 

Contra Corona was made by a partnership between Aptor Software, Batatando Games, University of São Carlos and FAPESP (Research Support Foundation of the State of S. Paulo).

* ANDROID (Google Play): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.com.ludoeducativo.contracorona

Team:
